nodes.bodyText: I think this was handled by typetools/jdk@8bc4048 so maybe it can be removed too.

-classpath; you don't have to do anything special for it.

nodes.bodyText:
Could you add a comment why they are skipped?
Isn't the build file already not copying the module-info from the JDK?
At some point we might want default annotations on the module level.
This new option should be documented in the manual.
